newsitem.title: USA: Penril approve Access spinoff, merger.
newsitem.headline: Penril approve Access spinoff, merger.

text.p: Penril DataComm Networks said on Friday that its shareholders approved a transaction to distribute shares of its Access Beyond remote access products business to shareholders.
The spinoff would establish Access Beyond as a new publicly-traded company, Penril said.

Shareholders also approved Penril's previously announced agreement with Bay Networks Inc, the company said. After the spin-off, Bay Networks would acquire Penril's modem business in a tax-free stock transaction.
Penril shareholders would receive one new share of Access Beyond for each Penril share held as of the November 14 record date, the company said.
At the close of the sale to Bay Networks, expected on November 18, each Penril holder on that date would receive 0.448 shares of Bay Networks stock for every Penril share, the company said.
